page.title: 12Peterlee And Religion.
page.content:
In our our interviews with them _ Father Meagher of the{Catholic church, Reverend Wodehouse of the{Anglican}and Mr. Lawson of the{Methodist}_ all made the same points about the problems of Peterlee. Broken marriages and apathy have led to a decline in church attendance,while unemployment causes family trouble. Those who are strong in their faith join in the ecumenical movement.
Our{Catholic schools}and church are joined in many ways. Children make their First Communion at age 7,and are confirmed at about 12. Every Thursday the school attends church. Special occasions are marked with processions, plays and mimes in school. Father Meagher is the school's friend,he even goes with the children on school trips!
